```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#for the Katomoba dataset there is a large amount of outliers where cliff line areas are over or underestimated 

```{r}
kat_high_error_evenbetter <- read_excel("~/Documents/R/hons_local_r/update/v2/kat_high_error_evenbetter.xlsx")
View(kat_high_error_evenbetter)
```


```{r}
hist(kat_high_error_evenbetter$dem_error, xlab = "DEM Error (m)", main = NULL)
```

```{r}
kat_high_error_evenbetter %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=dem_error, y=tri_1)) +
  geom_point(shape=20, color="blue")+
  geom_smooth(method=lm, color="brown2")
```
